title: Diablo + Hellfire [PC] [ENGLISH] [FULL]
description:
[b]INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS[/b]

[b]DIABLO[/b]

1. Burn/Mount the image on a CD/Virtual Drive.
2. Apply the 1.09b update to patch the game to the latest version.
3. [b]YOU DON'T NEED TO INSTALL HELLFIRE IN ORDER TO PLAY DIABLO![/b]

[b]HELLFIRE[/b]

1. Burn/Mount the image on a CD/Virtual Drive.
2. Apply the 1.01 update to patch the game to the latest version.
3. [b]YOU DON'T NEED TO INSTALL DIABLO IN ORDER TO PLAY HELLFIRE![/b]

[b]Optional[/b]

4. After applying the 1.01 patch copy the command.txt (text document) in your Hellfire directory if you want to unlock the [b]Barbarian[/b] and [b]Bard[/b] classes along with a few extra quests.

[b]NOTE[/b]

[url=http://www.lurkerlounge.com/diablo/jarulf/jarulf162.pdf] [b][color=red]You can also download Jarulf's Guide to Diablo and Hellfire (best walkthrough/guide on the internet)[/color][/b] [/url]

[b]Enjoy & Seed![/b]
